name: Ext_R2_NutritionOrder_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.NutritionOrder.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents NutritionOrder.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionOrder|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: proposed | draft | planned | requested | active | on-hold | completed | cancelled
element.definition: The workflow status of the nutrition order/request.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.status` maps to R4 `NutritionOrder.status`. The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element NutritionOrder.status is flagged IsModifier

element.short: proposed | draft | planned | requested | active | on-hold | completed | cancelled
element.definition: The workflow status of the nutrition order/request.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.status` maps to R4 `NutritionOrder.status`. The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo.

binding.description: Codes specifying the state of the request. Describes the lifecycle of the nutrition order.
